GitLab Integration

Codekeeper integrates directly with developer workflows on GitLab and other popular SCM-platforms. Source code deposits into the escrow are encrypted and fully automated. No coding required!

CONNECT

About GitLab

GitLab is a popular development tool that many companies use to handle their source code management and deployments.

How GitLab works with Codekeeper

Codekeeper connects directly to GitLab, which means you can easily deposit your source code and keep it in sync.

Get Started with Software Escrow

Codekeeper is the easy and affordable solution for software developers and publishers to save time, money, and increase sales. Set up your first escrow today to protect your code and data.
